name: Soumya Singh
position: Marketing & Brand Communication Manager @GUS Global | ShareChat | MXPlayer | InMobi
about: I have been eager to learn from a very young age, and my inquisitiveness has always been supplanted by my love for marketing & businesses. I often find myself taking up responsibilities and challenges that seem daunting, and work hard to deliver executable business value. Thus I always believe in getting the work done by people and through people.

volunteer_experience.info:
I was  selected as one among 450 entrepreneurs for Jagriti Yatra, which is a 15-day long, national train journey across the length and breadth of India, to understand and build the India of smaller towns and villages through enterprise. Jagriti Yatra is an ambitious train journey of discovery and transformation that takes hundreds of India's highly motivated youth, especially those who are from small towns and villages of India, on a 15 day, 8000 km national odyssey to meet the role models -…
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
           I was  selected as one among 450 entrepreneurs for Jagriti Yatra, which is a 15-day long, national train journey across the length and breadth of India, to understand and build the India of smaller towns and villages through enterprise. Jagriti Yatra is an ambitious train journey of discovery and transformation that takes hundreds of India's highly motivated youth, especially those who are from small towns and villages of India, on a 15 day, 8000 km national odyssey to meet the role models - social and business entrepreneurs - of the country. The vision of Jagriti is 'building India through enterprise'.

current_company_name: GUS Global Services India Pvt. Ltd.
projects: [{"title":"Marketing and Branding","start_date":"Apr 2017","end_date":"Present","description":"Fashinscoop is India’s leading fashion social network and the ultimate destination for fashionistas to socialise, discover trends, inspire and get inspired.It aims to provide one with the most seamless experience in fashion exploring the best of personalized fashion on Fashinscoop."},{"title":"Assignment Billability Analytics Application","start_date":"Jan 2017","end_date":"Present","description":"Client : Cognizant Application ServicesTechnology/Tools : Pentaho Tools, Javascript, Html/CSS, GreenplumProject Overview : Dashboard creation for this application aimed at giving information regarding two systems where associates hours are clocked as Billable and Non-Billable.Project Description : This application focused on 2 systems: System A and System B. System A (Assignments) was concerned with creation of associates assignments. System B (PAS) was one where managers can check and declare how many hours out of eligible hours can be billed to customer during ESA freeze from 27th of month to the end of month. Further various reports and fusion charts on monthly and daily basis was incorporated in the dashboard with the help of Pentaho Tools and PostgreSQL. Roll-up and Roll-Down reports from Project level was done to give a clear idea about this revenue."},{"title":"AVM (Application Value Management) Application","start_date":"Sep 2016","end_date":"Present","description":"Client : Cognizant Application ServicesTechnology/Tools : Pentaho Tools, Javascript, Html/CSS, PostgreSQLProject Overview : Creating an overview of maintenance project’s data in Cognizant.Project Description: AVM Application involved creation of AVM Dashboard along with various supporting reports and graph for clients to view Maintenance Projects data in Cognizant. Using Pentaho Tools and PostgreSQL we demonstrated on Dashboard total headcount, cost involved, project count etc related to all the Maintenance Projects in Cognizant as per requirement."},{"title":"Account Receivables Management Dashboard","start_date":"Feb 2017","end_date":"May 2017","description":"Client : Cognizant Application ServicesTechnology/Tools : Pentaho Tools, Javascript, Html/CSS, Greenplum Project Overview : The Receivables Management Dashboard lets one measure and track their department’s performance over time. The comparative analysis and trend reporting capabilities provided by this Dashboard helps one to identify systemic processing inefficiencies in your department.Project Description : This dashboard focuses on comparative analysis and trend reporting of days sales outstanding, collection effectiveness, and average days paid. One can see the amount of receivables that was issued and how many receipts were collected during the period. This can then be used to evaluate the effectiveness of their strategies and processes"}]
